short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension that assist in exploring and leaving ratings and reviews about website experiences.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Reviewly, you no longer need to surf the internet to find reviews about any website. Simply install the extension and have all the reviews for the site you're visiting right at your fingertips. Reviewly also provides the site rating whenever you visit a website.

Using Reviewly, you can also share your opinion on the user experience of a website, review a purchase, or simply comment on an article without leaving the site or navigating through hundreds of review sites. You can easily post your own or someone else's review on your social media, reaching a wider audience to share your perspective.

Join Reviewly to make the internet more transparent and honest!
